snippet: Moe Angelos has adapted the first volume of Susan Sontag’s journals and stars in “Sontag: Reborn,” a Builders Association production at the Public Theater, part of the Under the Radar festival.
abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews Public Theater production of play Sontag: Reborn, based on the journals of Susan Sontag, directed by Marianne Weems and adapted and performed by Moe Angelos as part of the Under the Radar festival.
lead_paragraph: Moe Angelos has adapted the first volume of Susan Sontag’s journals and stars in “Sontag: Reborn,” a Builders Association production at the Public Theater, part of the Under the Radar festival.
